query.params: os_product_family, os_product_version, package_name, fix_version, platform_cpe, cve_name

mode.name: get_vulnerable_packages
mode.query: SELECT vulnerablePkg.name AS vulnerablePkgName, vulnerablePkg.fix_version AS vulnerablePkgFixVersion FROM suseovalvulnerablepackage vulnerablePkg, rhncve cve, suseovalplatform platform, suseovalplatformvulnerablepackage platVulnerablePkg WHERE cve.name = :cve_name AND platform.cpe = :product_cpe AND platVulnerablePkg.cve_id = cve.id AND platVulnerablePkg.platform_id = platform.id AND platVulnerablePkg.vulnerable_pkg_id = vulnerablePkg.id;

mode.name: can_audit_cve
mode.query: SELECT 1 FROM suseOVALPlatformVulnerablePackage platVul, rhncve cve WHERE platVul.cve_id = cve.id AND cve.name = :cve_name;

mode.name: check_oval_availability
mode.query: SELECT 1 FROM suseOVALPlatform plat WHERE starts_with(:cpe, plat.cpe);

mode.name: check_errata_availability
mode.query: SELECT 1 FROM suseCVEServerChannel, rhnChannelErrata WHERE suseCVEServerChannel.channel_id = rhnChannelErrata.channel_id AND server_id = :server_id

write-mode.name: clear_oval_metadata_by_os_product
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM suseOVALOsProduct WHERE os_family = :os_product_family AND version = :os_product_version;
